input.sentences: after our trip to the beach we decided to go see the aquarium .
there was all kinds of sea life on display .
this eel popped his head out for a picture .
output.sentences: I had such a great time at the beach today.
I saw a tiny little crab climbing up a rock.
We snorkeled and saw many exotic fish.
The coolest thing we saw was a family of jellyfish.
I couldn't believe how amazing all of the ocean creatures were!
